=============================== [B][size=4][color=Red]Update Log[/color][/size][/B] ==================================


[B][color=#006400]20121006 02:20 - Update to v1.3 :[/color][/B]
1. Add the Healing Function?

[B][color=#006400]20121003 14:40 - Update to v1.2 :[/color][/B]
1. Add the translation of Nord\'s Description.
2. Remove no-BBP body Options.
3. Change Grandies\' body textures.
4. GrandiesSummonRing can be Crafted.

[B][color=#006400]20121001 15:50 - Update to v1.1 :[/color][/B]
1. Fixed the GrandiesSummonRing\'s Object Biped.



============================================================================= 


I\'m trying to add some new element to Grandies, here are functions : 


[B][size=3][color=#63B8FF]1. Summon Grandies or Unsummon Grandies any time : [/color][/size][/B]
When you installed this MOD and begin the Game, 
the system will add the GrandiesSommunRing to your bag.
You can Equiped the Ring to Summon Grandies, and Unequiped the Ring to unsummon Grandies.
But mentioned it, if you haven\'t recruiting Grandies, it\'s no use about this ring.
Equiping the Ring, Grandies will be summoned in front of player, and recovered all of her health.
Unequiping the Ring, Grandies will disappear. But don\'t worry, the items which you gave wouldn\'t be removed.
BTW, GrandiesSummonRing can be Crafted, in jewel section.


-----------------------------------------------------------------


[B][size=3][color=#63B8FF]2. Auto Changing-Outfit Function : [/color][/size][/B]
You can use the Shout to changing Grandies\' Outfit.
When you installed this MOD and begin the Game, 
the system will add the \"Grandies ChangeWear Shout to player.
It\'s no use for another NPC, just be available to Grandies who is your Partner.
The word1 of Grandies ChangeWear Shout is changing Grandies\' wear.
The word3 of Grandies ChangeWear Shout is removing all of  Grandies\' Outfit which are \"Outfit of Auto-Changing\".


-----------------------------------------------------------------


[B][size=3][color=#63B8FF]3. Healing Function : [/color][/size][/B]
I add the Healing Function in 1.3 version.
In 1.3 version, I just unlocked the Healing Ability which is \" Healing player\'s 20% Health , Cooldown 5 sec\".
And here are some options you can set :\" lower than 10%?30% or 50% health, Grandies just start to heal the player\"
If you Unsummoned Grandies, this function will be closed. And next time you have to reset if you want to use.
I will Unlock advanced healing Ability in next version.


============================================================================= 


[B][size=4][color=Red]Grandies\' Location : [/color][/size][/B]
Riften ----> Thieves Guild ----> The Ragged Flagon

intial level is 6. She is a Scout.





[B][size=4][color=Red]Note : [/color][/size][/B]
1. Use [B]NMM[/B] to install this MOD
2. [B]Had better[/B] to install the BBP skeleton.(Because of Some \"Auto-changing-Wear\" are BBP.)
3. If You can\'t see the Grandies\' body, try to update to the Dawnguard version, or Use CK(export facegen by Ctrl+F4)
4. If Grandies don\'t have healing options in coversation, try to use QuickSAVE and QuickLOAD.
